verses.verse: <S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H6965>arises<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you and <S%H5414>gives<s%> you a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H4159>wonder,<s%>

and the <S%H226>sign<s%> or the <S%H4159>wonder<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> true, concerning <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>(whom<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known<s%>) and let us <S%H5647>serve<s%> them,'

you shall not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of that <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams;<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5254>testing<s%> you to <S%H3045>find<s%> out if you <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

"You shall <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H1980><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him; and you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him, and <S%H1692>cling<s%> to Him.

"But that <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H1696>counseled<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery,<s%> to <S%H5080>seduce<s%> you from the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H1980>walk.<s%> So you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> your mother's <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> you <S%H2436>cherish,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> your <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is as your own <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5496>entice<s%> you <S%H5643>secretly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>' <S%H834>(whom<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> you <S%H3808>nor<s%> your fathers have <S%H1>known,<s%>

of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> you, <S%H7138>near<s%> you <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from you, from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> to the other <S%H7097>end<s%>),

you shall not <S%H14>yield<s%> to him or <S%H8085>listen<s%> to him; and your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> him, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H2550>spare<s%> or <S%H3680>conceal<s%> him.

"But you shall <S%H2026>surely<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> him; your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> against him to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H314>afterwards<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"So you shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5080>seduce<s%> you from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>

"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you to <S%H3427>live<s%> in, [anyone] <S%H559>saying<s%> [that]

some <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H3318>gone<s%> out from <S%H7130>among<s%> you and have <S%H5080>seduced<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>' <S%H834>(whom<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known<s%>),

then you shall <S%H1875>investigate<s%> and <S%H2713>search<s%> out and <S%H7592>inquire<s%> <S%H3190>thoroughly.<s%> And <S%H2009>if<s%> it is <S%H571>true<s%> [and] the <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H3559>established<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> has been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you,

you shall <S%H5221>surely<s%> <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroying<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it and its <S%H929>cattle<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H7998>booty<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of its <S%H7339>open<s%> <S%H7339>square<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H7998>booty<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> as a <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H3632>burnt<s%> <S%H3632>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H8510>ruin<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> It shall <S%H3808>never<s%> be <S%H1129>rebuilt.<s%>

"And <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> from that <S%H9172>which<s%> is put <S%H9172>under<s%> the <S%H9172>ban<s%> shall <S%H1692>cling<s%> to your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may <S%H7725>turn<s%> from His <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H5414>show<s%> <S%H7356>mercy<s%> to you, and <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on you and make you <S%H7235>increase,<s%> <S%H3152>just<s%> as He has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your fathers,

<S%H3588>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> and <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
